meanings: (말·충고 등을) listen (to), follow, obey, take (one's advice), (Am) mind, (formal) heed
(효과가 있다) have an effect (on), be effective, work (for), act (on)
the first time to hear[the first sound]

examples.korean: He went into hysterics when he heard the news. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 소식을 듣자 그는 히스테리 발작을 일으켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He went into hysterics when he heard the news. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He broke down and wept when he heard the news. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 소식을 듣자 그가 허물어지며 울었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
